name: DriftShip
description:
DriftShip is a fast paced space shooter made to replicate old-school arcade  games. It was made in a week as part of the Mouse Movement Jam. Full of surprises and teeth-grinding challenges, you'll find yourself on the edge of your seat blasting through the various enemies, and unlocking the many ships the game has to offer.

Features

  • 16 unique ships
  • 3 Unique gamemodes including Arcade, Hardmode, and Rock Rush
  • A dedicated soundtrack for every game mode
  • Challenges for every player
  • Easter eggs >.>

System

  • Windows 7
  • Windows 8.1
  • Windows 10

Credits
